modName: Give Yourself Full Ebony Armor Set
summary: You can have it in a flash...
descriptionHtml:
This is my favorite armor (and one of the best armors in Skyrim) which I got in a \"legal\" way, but if you want to spare yourself the trouble (whatever reason you may have) this file is for you...

INSTRUCTIONS:

Extract this txt file to the same folder where your TESV.exe is located.
Load the game and press ~ (tilde, it\'s right below ESC on your keyboard) and type \"bat ebony\" only without quotes.

Ebony armor, helmet, shield, boots and gauntlets will be added to your inventory.

To close the console, simply press ~ again.

IF YOU DON\'T LIKE THE FILE, DON\'T DOWNLOAD IT!!!
author: cooljacker111
